description: This comforting beef & vegetable soup recipe is hearty, rich and packed full of veggies. An easy midweek meal with minimal effort and cost.Â
keywords: Soup,Holidays & entertaining,Fresh ingredients,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Sesame free,Beef,Potato,Mushroom,One-pot,Soy free,Comfort food,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Beef & Vegetable Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Trim excess fat from steak and cut into strips. Heat oil in a large pot over high heat. Add beef and sear well all over. Transfer to a plate.

Add extra oil, if necessary, and cook onion, celery and carrot over medium-low heat for 5 minutes or until vegetables start to soften. Add parsnip, potato, mushroom, rosemary, broth and 3 cups water. Season. Bring to the boil, add sauce and paste, reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
Add cabbage, beans and beef and simmer for a further 5 minutes. Serve immediately.
